pullRequest.body:
---

Best reviewed commit by commit.
I'm stuck at fixing the build error in PrimeSpectrum/Basic; help by an algebraic geometry person welcome.

@urkud Since you renamed the types in this file recently, would you like to take a look?

<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

[![Open in Gitpod](https://gitpod.io/button/open-in-gitpod.svg)](https://gitpod.io/from-referrer/)

nodes.body: Please make CI happy first.

CI is happy, except for one error in PrimeSpectrum/Basic (which I've asked about on zulip).

(Sorrying that proof builds locally, so there is really just this one proof.)
I merged `master` to see if there are any conflicts with #9963
I think that `continuous_def` intentionally used `{}` for `TopologicalSpace` arguments so that it works well with `simp` when topologies are not those provided by instances.

Thanks! Once CI is happy, please merge this PR using `bors r+`
bors d+

:v: grunweg can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).

Thanks! :tada:
bors merge

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7663704896/job/20886919694)
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7663704896/job/20886919897)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7663704896/job/20886920034)

> I think that `continuous_def` intentionally used `{}` for `TopologicalSpace` arguments so that it works well with `simp` when topologies are not those provided by instances.

The `{}` brackets worked better for some of my code, at least. See my comment: https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/commit/20c7b4b802f5ad61a2c1621e707b906cfe79366c#r137856007
@dwrensha Thanks; I was not aware of this. I have submitted #10110 reverting that particular change.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - chore(Topology/Basic): re-use variables; rename a : X to x : X

source.title: [Merged by Bors] - fix(TopologicalSpace/Basic): restore curly braces in `continuous_def`
